originalText.text: I’ve been seeing Dr. Kim for injectables for years. I cannot recommend him highly enough, he never tries to up sell and he will refuse to do anything that he thinks looks unnatural. Additionally, he has a wonderful bedside manner.

text.text: I’ve been seeing Dr. Kim for injectables for years. I cannot recommend him highly enough, he never tries to up sell and he will refuse to do anything that he thinks looks unnatural. Additionally, he has a wonderful bedside manner.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of WV Plastic Surgery since 2018 and I have always been pleased with my results. I have seen Dr Kim for botox, filler, epad, and microneedling facials. Without his guidance and treatments, I know my skin would not look the way it does. He recommended I start microneedling (a service that is provided by Tessa, who is also lovely!) over a year ago. The treatment has resulting in clearing up a scar I had on my cheekbone, and it improved the texture of my skin. I notice my pores are smaller, tighter skin and a reduction in fine lines. My complexion is better and more even toned. WV Plastic Surgery started offering a skin care line a little over a year ago and I have been using it since its inception. I really like the serums and creams that have become an intergral part of my skin care routine. I highly recommend the antiaging serum, hyaluronic acid serum, multi-correction cream and the sunblock powder. My favorite part is they have these products in travel size so it makes it really easy to stick to my skin routine while traveling.  I highly recommend West Village Plastic Surgery. The team there is wonderful!

originalText.text: This is a great practice, with a personalized approach from Dr. Kim. He performed a facelift, rhinoplasty, lower blepharoplasty, stomach liposuction, removed some buccal fat, and applied Sculptra. It was all very subtle (at first I thought, too subtle!). But 2 years later I'm constantly getting compliments from old college friends (I'm 53), who seem baffled how young I look. My face doesn't look stretched or weird in any way. I would describe Dr. Kim's approach as tasteful and expert. (When I showed a separate doctor the behind-the-ear scar from the in-office facelift when it was still new, she described the work as "gorgeous." And yes, a full facelift performed in-office; what a concept!!!) I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Kim, and will return for any maintenance in the future, 100%!
